revised_title: Quantification and Evaluation of Risks to Health from Chemicals
tldr: This article discusses the assessment and evaluation of risks to health from chemicals, focusing on the importance of understanding dose-response relationships, cost, and benefits. The author emphasizes the need for continuous review of chemical use and the development of more robust processes for evaluating risks from chemicals, considering factors such as social and economic impacts.
